original_title: Yosemite: The World's Most Spectacular Valley
overview: Immortalized by photographer Ansel Adams and championed by naturalist John Muir, Yosemite is one of America's most awe-inspiring and popular national parks. This video offers a lavish look at the park and its history, with images of the landscape, wildlife and recreation opportunities as well as a peek into the park's role in pop culture, art and music, and a brief look at how the valley was formed.
title: Yosemite: The World's Most Spectacular Valley
